name: baby spicy mix
description:
bold + peppery medley
Our baby spicy mix is a bold + peppery medley of spicy mustard greens, peppery arugula and juicy bok choy.

name: baby super mix
description:
hearty power blend
0ur baby super mix is a hearty power blend of sweet baby kale, zesty watercress and juicy bok choy.

name: baby bok choy
description:
juicier than spinach
AeroFarms Baby Bok Choy, The New Spinach is reimagining how to create a better spinach experience that is juicier, more flavorful, and even more nutrient dense with an ANDI (Aggregate Nutrient Density Index) score of 865 vs. spinach at 707, and it can be enjoyed in just about any spinach recipe for an updated new take on the dish.

name: baby arugula
description:
perfectly peppery
Tender + perfectly peppery with the right amount of bite.

name: baby kale
description:
sweet + tender
A crowd favorite, our perfectly tender Baby Kale is grown for peak sweetness with no bitter note whatsoever.

name: baby watercress
description:
zesty powerhouse
Zesty + bright baby greens with crunchy, juicy stems and a floral finish.

name: BrightFarms BABY BUTTER
description: Our Baby Butter is the softer and sweeter version of butterhead lettuce. Buttery soft and perfectly bite size – what’s not to love!

name: BrightFarms BUTTER CRISP
description: Our Baby Butter with a Crunch!

name: BrightFarms MIGHTY ROMAINE
description: Our Baby Romaine with a Crunch!

name: BrightFarms BABY SPINACH
description: Our Baby Spinach is so uniquely tender, you can taste the difference! It is as versatile as it is delicious. Try it in salads or as an ingredient in your favorite smoothie.

name: Baby Spinach
description:
tender & sweet
our crown jewel and our reason for growing.
Perfect for salads, sautées, & smoothies.

name: BrightFarms BABY ROMAINE
description: The crisp texture and delicate flavor of Baby Romaine goes great in your favorite sandwich or as a key ingredient in a Caesar salad.

name: Berries
description:
Our berries are locally grown, available year-round, and unbelievably delicious. Now we're not sure which one is better. It’s a problem we're not complaining about.

The Garden Berry
The quintessential summer strawberry — full of juicy sweetness.
PAIRS WELL WITH
Light, delicate foods, whipped cream, simple arugula salads, and sipping rosé at rooftop hangouts.

The Wild Berry
Nuanced, bright, and floral flavors make this berry a rollercoaster of flavor.
PAIRS WELL WITH
Dark, rich foods, hard cheddar and crackers, dark chocolate, sea salt, and flexing your culinary skills.

name: Omakase Berries
description: Our Omakase Berry is a unique Japanese variety characterized by its beautiful aroma, exceptional sweetness, signature seedless appearance, and creamy texture. A deep, sensory fruit experience long prized in Japanese food culture, but only now being discovered in America.

name: Baby Kale
description: Baby Kale is harvested before it reaches the full maturity of an adult kale plant, so it carries the hearty flavor of its full-grown counterpart while providing a sweeter finish. It’s delicate enough for salads and smoothies, but also sturdy enough to hold up in hot dishes.

name: Arugula
description: Velvety with a peppery bite, our Arugula adds a courageous spice to any dish. Try it plain or with olive oil and lemon to experience its flavor in the purest form.

name: Green Goddess
description: Tangy, creamy and versatile, our Green Goddess dressing is perfect as a dip or tossed with greens.

name: Chrysanthemum Greens
description: From Caesar salads to hot pot, these baby lacy greens bring a subtly sweet, balanced bite to any dish. Try them in salads, as garnish, or in a beverage. Available for a limited-time.

name: Mustard Frills
description: Our debut small batch green with big-time flavor is back and bringing the heat!

name: Hybrid Striped Bass
description: A white freshwater fish grown free of antibiotics, hormones, and mercury, our hybrid striped bass have the perfect balance of light, flaky flesh with a meatiness and richness that will leave you satiated. If you're a fan of fish skin, our striped bass skin crisps nicely for a crunchy contrast to its tender flesh.

name: BrightFarms BASIL
description: Fragrant and flavorful, our tender Basil just may be the best you've ever tried. It makes amazing pesto, adds lush flavor to a stir fry, and goes perfectly with fresh mozzarella, a drizzle of olive oil, and sliced tomatoes.

name: Cilantro
description: Also known as coriander, this citrusy, fragrant herb is a staple in many cuisines, often used to brighten flavors and counteract spices in dishes like curries and tacos.

name: Cilantro
description: Aromatic. Clean. Peppery.

name: Dill
description: Citrusy. Feathery. Mild.

name: Parsley
description:
Crisp. Airy. Subtle.
Square Roots Parsley has an airy flavor that makes it the ideal garnish on almost every dish. Sprinkle it on fresh right before serving to top off your favorite meal.

name: Basil
description:
Fragrant. Sweet. Bright.
Square Roots Basil can make a home in whatever you are cooking, from savory dishes to sweeter experiments. Used as a garnish or added during cooking, this green adds a burst of flavor to any dish.

name: Basil
description: Our Genovese basil is a fragrant addition to salads and pastas.

name: Parsley
description: Parsley is used to top dishes and enrich stews all around the world. The herb’s bright, refreshing flavor balances nicely with heavier dishes, making it a great garnish for meats and pastas.

name: Basil
description: Sweet, aromatic and inviting—there is a reason this herb is so popular around the world.

name: Baby Romaine
description: Baby Romaine’s tender leaves brighten up any salad, but this green especially shines when paired with a creamy dressing.

name: Crispy Leaf
description: Invigorate your palate with our crunchiest green yet, Crispy Leaf. Its delightfully crisp center and frilly edges add texture and a refreshing finish to any dish you dream up.

name: Baby Butter
description: Velvety with a peppery bite, our Arugula adds a courageous spice to any dish. Try it plain or with olive oil and lemon to experience its flavor in the purest form.

name: micro spicy mix
description:
bold + zesty blend
A bold and zesty blend of spicy mustard greens, peppery arugula & juicy bok choy for an instant pop of heat.

name: micro super mix
description:
healthy personal salad
A powerhouse blend of sweet kale, red cabbage, and juicy bok choy for a hearty personal salad.

name: micro wasabi mustard
description:
hot + bold
Hot and bold for an instant pop of heat.

name: micro broccoli
description:
mighty + balanced
Mighty and balanced, our broccoli microgreens have  earthy notes & a slightly sweet finish.

name: micro arugula
description:
peppery + bright
Peppery and bright, our arugula microgreens add a bold spice to any dish.

name: micro kale
description:
sweet + wholesome
Sweet and wholesome, our kale microgreens are tender mild & a versatile recipe staple.

name: micro rainbow mix
description:
vibrant medley
A vibrant medley of earthy cabbage, sweet kale & spicy mustard greens for a colorful boost for any dish.

name: Baby Kale Mix
description: Baby Kale Mix cheers up any dish with hearty, sweet, and well-rounded flavor while boasting a range of colors.

name: Mighty Microgreens Mix
description: Bright and hearty, this mix of broccoli, kale, and kohlrabi attracts even the pickiest eaters.

name: Spicy Microgreens Mix
description: Hot and sharp, this mix of mustard, kohlrabi, and radish has a clear-your-sinuses kick to it and will enhance the flavor of any meal.

name: Mixed Greens
description: Subtly sweet, velvety texture, with the perfect amount of crunch—that’s the unmistakable experience of Mixed Greens.

name: Spring Mix
description: Sweet, zesty and versatile. That’s what you get when red, green, and romaine lettuces meet mustard greens in this classic blend.

name: Umami Mushroom Pack
description: Add depth to your meal with shiitakes, and sop up the flavor with our oysters.

name: Oyster Mushroom Pack
description: Contains our popular yellow and blue oyster mushrooms. One 8oz container will make a great stew.

name: Lions Mane Mushrooms
description:
Flavor :
Nutty, sweet and savory. 

Texture:
Soft and spongy.

Cooking Applications:
Can be shredded, pressed into steaks, or thrown into soup, almost like dumplings. A great substitute for any recipe that calls for crab or lobster meat.

name: Blue Oyster Mushrooms
description:
Flavor :
Sweet and rich, mild umami.

Texture:
Sturdy and absorbent, chewy in the best way

Cooking Applications:
Great in stir fries, fried rice, pasta sauces or with eggs for breakfast. Sauté, roast whole or grill ‘em. An excellent meat replacement given their texture and size.

name: Trumpet Mushrooms
description:
Flavor:
Buttery and sweet.

Texture:
Thick, meaty stems, and pleasantly chewy.


Cooking Applications:
Slice lengthwise and grill or sauté, or slice into rounds and score with a criss cross pattern. Great for stuffings, pot-pies, and grilling.

name: Yellow Oyster Mushrooms
description:
Flavor:
Nutty, floral, lightly umami.

Texture:
Tender and delicate with stems that have a snap.

Cooking Applications:
The caps crisp nicely when fried or roasted. Perfect for pasta dishes. Put them in almost everything for a "hint" of mushroom flavor.

name: Shiitake Mushrooms
description:
Flavor:
Strong savory and umami flavor, slightly smoky. 

Texture:
Caps have a soft, spongy quality and chewier stems. When cooked, texture ranges from delicate to meaty.

Cooking Applications:
Perfect for pot roasts, stir fries, soups, and infused into cocktails.

name: Maitake Mushrooms
description:
Flavor:
Woody and tangy.

Texture:
Delicate and feathery.

Cooking Applications:
Great for stir fries, risottos, pizzas, mushrooms sauces, or seared on a skillet. When pressed, crisps very well.

name: Mushrooms in bulk.
description: If you're interested in buying a large quantity of our mushrooms, reach out to us below!

name: Fancy Mushroom Pack
description: Sample the mushrooms we've been custom growing for chefs in Brooklyn.

name: Lef Farms Smooth
description: A blend of Leaf Lettuce, Pac Choi, Mizuna, and Oakleaf. Its name says it all. This buttery blend of crisp, sweet, and tender baby greens provides an ultra-smooth easygoing mix for salad connoisseurs who prefer to let the toppings or dressing bring the zest. Contains a delicious blend of tasty greens great for salads and wraps.

name: Lef Farms Crisp
description: A fresh leaf lettuce with a bright flavor and crunchy bite. Crisp is a crunchy new alternative to traditional Romaine and Iceberg lettuce and combines a robust, crispy bite with a fresh, bright flavor — making it go perfectly with salads, sandwiches, and wraps.

name: Lef Farms Fusion
description: A simple blend of soft and crunchy green and red baby lettuce. A delicious new mix that combines a unique flavor with a slightly crunchier texture profile you can't find anywhere else. For those who want a little more punch than the classic Spring mix, this is it.

name: BrightFarms HARVEST CRUNCH
description: Harvest Crunch is a delightful duo of our crunchy red and green leaf lettuces. Like Sunny Crunch, with added crunchy red leaf for color and flavor!

name: Arugula & Spinach
description:
peppery & sweet
the ideal blend for our most popular greens
Toss as a salad, heap onto a pizza, or wilt into pasta.

name: Spinach & Lettuce
description:
tender & crispy
Elevate your everyday salad with the perfect blend of our sweet baby spinach and crispy lettuce.

name: BrightFarms SPRING MIX
description: This combination of soft baby greens and sweet tender lettuces creates a delightful mix of variety and textures.

name: BrightFarms 50/50 SPRING AND SPINACH
description: This sweet and savory blend combines our Baby Spinach with a tasty selection of our unmistakably fresh, tender greens and lettuces.

name: Butterhead
description: Butterhead leaves (aka Boston or Bibb) are soft and sweet, with a buttery texture. Perfect for lettuce wraps or tacos.

name: Arugula
description: This zingy, peppery green is delicious with a light dressing, sautéed as a side or even as a pizza topping.

name: Super Mix
description: Hearty. Leafy. Crunchy.

name: BrightFarms SUNNY CRUNCH
description: It looks like a leafy green, but eats like iceberg. It’s light, crispy, crunchy, and perfect for kids!

name: BrightFarms NUTRIGREENS®
description: Supercharge your immune system with NutriGreens! A revolutionary new superfood lettuce naturally bursting with 2x the antioxidants of blueberries.

name: Lef Farms Spice
description: A blend of Arugula, Mustard, Cressida, Mizuna, and Leaf Lettuce. When you want to shake up your arugula salad, your mizuna salad, or just your everyday salad with a little zip, reach for a zesty bag of Spice. Its palate-pleasing flavor and texture add a little complexity to your salads and wraps.

name: CHICKPEA CAESAR Crunch KitTM
description: A delightful twist on a culinary classic. This kit starts with fresh BrightFarms Sunny Crunch® greens, topped with crispy chickpeas, organic quinoa, shaved parmesan, garlic crouton crumbles, and paired with a vegan Caesar dressing.

name: SUNNY BACON Crunch Kit
description: This savory salad will have you beaming. This kit starts with fresh BrightFarms Sunny Crunch® greens topped with uncured bacon bits, shredded white cheddar cheese, sunflower seeds, crispy onions, herb croutons, and paired with a vegan Ranch dressing.

name: Chimichurri
description: Our Chimichurri combines fresh basil with jalapeños and parsley to create a delicious, time-saving marinade or sauce with a spicy kick.

name: Classic Pesto
description: Our Classic Pesto is made with our own Genovese Basil, extra virgin olive oil, parmigiano and coarse sea salt.

name: Greens Pack
description:
Our baby greens, micro greens, herbs & flowers
Our freshly-harvested baby and micro greens, herbs and flowers selected from our range of 700 varieties.

Grown in Brooklyn and TriBeCa with zero pesticides, harvested on the morning of the delivery. Our greens are packed in large, high-quality, reusable plastic boxes that easily fit in a normal apartment fridge.

Choose a pack size that works for you - see below.

Each week the menu is curated to give you new crunch, flavor and a little something special.

name: Spring Mix
description: Refreshing. Tender. Lively
